ExampleDefinition.Description:
SciChart3D now natively supports selection of data-points via the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.VertexSelectionModifier3D.html']VertexSelectionModifier3D[/url].
This is a ChartModifier3D derived type which can be added to the SciChart3DSurface via the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.SciChart3DSurface~ChartModifier.html']SciChart3DSurface.ChartModifier[/url] property, or via a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.ModifierGroup3D.html']ModifierGroup3D[/url]
[i][b]Tip![/b][/i] [i]You can click on a data-point to select it, or, you can multi-select by holding down[/i] [b]CTRL[/b]. [i]Click elsewhere on the chart to deselect.[/i]
[b]Documentation Links[/b]
- [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.VertexSelectionModifier3D.html']VertexSelectionModifier3D[/url]
